synopsis.text:
Earth-projected souls with the potential to be 'Masters' are summoned to Tsukimihara Academy, an artificial high school serving as the battleground for the Holy Grail War. Hakuno Kishinami awakens in this virtual world with no memories, only to find himself in a ruthless fight for survival. The Moon Cell computer, which created this technological purgatory, promises the victor the Holy Grail, an object capable of granting any wish.

With a mysterious Servant by his side, Hakuno must navigate through this war, facing both friends and foes in deadly battles. As he embarks on a perilous journey to the Angelica Cage, the core of the Moon Cell, Hakuno seeks not only the Holy Grail but also the truth behind his forgotten past and his own identity. With his life and wishes on the line, Hakuno must unlock the secrets of this virtual world and conquer the challenges that lie ahead.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
